name: BED_PREFERENCE_EVENTS
description: This view contains the details on the various updates made to a bed preference record, such as adding, removing, or modifying the preference, including who updated the block and when they made that update. The records included in this view are Bed Events (BEV) records that are designated as bed preferences -- that is, Event Type (I BEV 150) has a value of 2.

columns.name: PREFERENCE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the request record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ASSOC_PEND_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the pending event that is associated with this bed event status update.
